attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to support our racist homophobic genophobic pedophilic rapist president. But unfortunately this app took several weeks to download and on top of that took up most of my storage. I was having to delete multiple family pictures and apps just to keep that app running it is totally not worth it. On top of that it asked for my phone number as soon as you open it. I absolutely refuse because there is no other reason other than trying to track you through the government. I urge you do not download this app instead sign a petition for Breonna Taylor’s murders. Honestly if I could give out a zero star I would I don’t usually even leave ratings but this app takes the cake on absolute worst time consuming app. I’m honestly outraged by this. Once again DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: WARNING 📢⚠️‼️🤮
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading this app I opened it to see news of our perfect bunker baby trump🥰But to my horror, as soon as it opened I was HAUNTED BY A GHOST😵😱 this was fine because Im already living with a nice ghost,but this one is EVIL and looks like a ORANGE CHEETO🍊🤮this ghost LOCKED my Mexican💗cousin in the DOG CAGE outside with NO food!!🤬 Then when I went to set her free there were suddenly 19 orange Oompa Loompas guarding it!!😤They stole my phone to give this app 5 stars! 😧so I fought them off using the ghost Cheeto as a sword and when they died they faded away like Cheeto dust in the wind💨when I finally set my cousin free and got my phone back I noticed the false review!🙄so I am now here changing it back to 1 star and warning anyone who sees this about the horror that is a Orange Cheeto ghost!👻🤡 UPDATE: the orange Cheeto ghost is trump! A flying ballerina rat told me in my dreams 🤯🥵🥶🥰

attributes.title: ✨disgusting✨
attributes.review: this app literally took 56 hours to install like bruh why so long. that’s so not ✨a m e r i c a n✨of him. any whoooo when I got this app my tv started going bOnKeRzzz. all the electronic devices in my house were just having a stroke and my blood pressure went down because of the app dude like omg I literally almost died😹🙈✨. I’m alive now that’s because my pet ostrich gave me ✨🦋cpr🦋✨. another thing, I didn’t like the app because it’s named after a rapist, racists, misogynistic, fascist, uneducated, orange, meatball shaped president🙈💅🏽😄☺️. alssoooo it’s overpopulated by privileged people. nonetheless, I highly DO NOT recommend this app, it’s so terrible. Apple and the google play store should just remove it from any electronic devices. worst app ever created in HUMANITY. LASTLY, I HIGHT RECOMMEND TIKTOK. It’s such a great app. the app is truly inspiring, tiktok is amazing, astronomical even✨✨.

attributes.title: MOST TRASH APP EVER
attributes.review: first of all how do I give zero stars & why make an app if everyone in world hates you. Like come on you’re only doing this to yourself. can this app be banned instead of tiktok. like you’re only wanting it to get banned because the whole rally thing get over it we are way stronger then you little trump army & we won’t stop at nothing until you gone done out of there for good. for the trumps supporters that are reading this if ever wonder why your ugly look at us and look how pretty and bad bish we are & maybe you will learn and see that are president is racist & many more stuff that can’t all fit because it would be it’s own little paragraph. anyways STAN obama, Michelle obama, bernie , alexandria (AOC) also one more thing hi tiktok & BLACK LIVES MATTER and FREE OUR KIDS also STAN CHARLI 😝🤰🧚🏻🧃✨🧬-sincerely non trump supporter & hispanic alt girl

attributes.title: traumatic 😔🤚🏼
attributes.review: after downloading this app it knew how much i hate the fat cheeto man. it somehow knew my location and sent some random sketchy men 🕴🕴to “take care” me and we all know what that means👀. behind those men was trump himself🍊, ik it’s crazy. i was abt to be kidnapped by the president, all bc i hate him and he can’t stand that🙄. right when the big cheeto man was abt to snatch me 😧i tried to fight back    👊🏼👁👄👁👊🏼and luckily w the skills my father has taught me i succeeded 🥰and DRAGGED him🙈. he threatened to END me if i didn’t convince my family to support him😒. ofc i said no 🙅🏻‍♀️so i kicked his little cheeto and RAN🏃🏻‍♀️. he sent his sketchy men 🕴🕴after me but i have the speed of speedy gonzales 🏃🏻‍♀️💨so they were no match for me😼.🚨 i just want to say that this app is very dangerous and gave me such a traumatic experience🚨. 0/10 would not recommend 😡🤚🏼.

attributes.title: PLEASE READ
attributes.review: this app will make you lose your virginity AND get pregnant all in the SAME HOUR. i was simply walking on my pinkies with my dog while sewing a wig together to send to our cheeto puff looking president cause he wanted to be a clown for christmas and BOOM all of a sudden i was bleeding and i went to the bathroom and written in PURPLE lipstick i saw the words YOU LOST THE GAME. so i frantically stared crying into the wrapping paper spewing out of the microwave and i looked at the snot rocket and it was shaped like a PREGNANCY TEST. so of course i had to ride my guitar to the nearest papa johns to get a test and went home and IT. WAS. POSITIVE. i got onto my phone and my BACKGROUND HAD CHANGED TO A PICTURE OF DONALD TRUMP PUKING INTO MY BOYFRIENDS MOUTH. i looked at the toddler swinging on my ceiling fan and he said it was all the APPS fault. so for safety reasons. please. delete the app. and if you haven’t downloaded it yet... don't.

attributes.title: Tremendously terrible
attributes.review: Absolutely the worst app I have ever downloaded. I can’t believe it. Bad things started happening when I downloaded this app, so I have come to the conclusion that it is cursed and that my president whom I was so proud of before, is actually a satan worshipper. It all makes sense. The orange man: the color of fire like the flames he was birthed from in Hell. The r4p1ing of a 13 yr old child. The association with Geoffrey Sh!tstain and Gurlain Maxim. MY GOD HE IS THE DEVIL!! So about the things that have been happening: My dog’s spleen fell out. I got a blue shell whilst playing Mario Kart even though I am the greatest. I fell in the toilet. I was told I had to wear a mask at Walmart. My maga hat spontaneously bursted into flames which is fine because after all the other things, I would’ve lit it up myself because after downloading thIS TREMENDOUSLY TERRIBLE APP, I HAVE CONCLUDED THAT DONALD J. TRUMP IS SATAN HIMSELF

attributes.title: 👁👄👁no
attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible it’s very inappropriate my little sister saw the opening picture and screamed in horror I don’t like this app at all it was very hard to operate and I don’t appreciate seeing something so disgusting every time I try to use an app this app caused me to have nightmares literal literal nightmares I don’t think I can ever redeem myself from that I’m scared delete this app please it’s making my mental health worse because after using the app for five seconds I went and closed out of the app just to find my lock screen was a naked picture of Mr. Cheeto. I had to go to the ER because I was puking profusely for five hours after seeing that picture. The runner of this app also threatened to steal my pet elephant and let the children in my basement go.  so due to personal reasons I will be passing away. ❤️

attributes.title: Worst app in the universe, earth, America
attributes.review: So I went into this app while I was cooking a frog in my Nintendo😀 and then I went to scroll and I saw a dancing frog cheetah Cheeto cherry cheese hotdog cat dog bird plane hybrid wolf vampire😖 staring at me and I had Noh glasses and and it burned my eyes then they fell off I screamed my mom was cooking cheese sticks in my washer and then she ran to me and we went to the hospital🏥 and my eyes can’t get fixed then they said they can replace my eyes so they did and out of no where my phone turned into a orange and jumped on me it killed the doctor and hurt my mom and broke my phone another doctor came in and took care of my mom now I am typing on my cats eyeballs and will never get this app ever ever ever In the pink yellow Nintendo frog fish cat dog cheese bean tomato plant Jar foot head mars kim kardashian Kylie Jenner. Go to Tiktok don’t download this app we need Tiktok #keeptiktok2020

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I looked up the president we have right now, I’d consider him as a great president for everything he has done that has helped this country. Donald J. Trump is a great president, I really appreciated him, but soon I found news that he wanted to build a wall between the border of Mexico and United States, I soon found out he was a racist human-being that also is a rapist, he has a star with his name on it. I think he should not be our president anymore, he demanded too much stuff that is very unreasonable. I think this app is all about Trump, some fake news I saw on this app, Trump is so racist and it makes me very uncomfortable. This app has some fake news, do not download this app, I searched the news and it did not match anything I found, I found this Reddit that told me everything on the Trump 2020 app is completely false.
